author: lorusso7
body: I update the  _DYToll01234Jets_5f_LO_MLM_Madgraph_LHE_13TeV_cff, DYToll012Jets_5f_NLO_FXFX_Madgraph_LHE_13TeV_cff, TTbar012Jets_5f_NLO_FXFX_Madgraph_LHE_13TeV_cff_ and _WTolNu01234Jets_5f_LO_MLM_Madgraph_LHE_13TeV_cff_ configuration file to use the new gridpack generated with Madggraph **2.4.2** .
title: Madgraph 2.4.2 cards
